empty_state_description:
Egress policies specify the source IP used for egress traffic based on identity, application, network, and geolocation attributes. Egress traffic will use the default Cloudflare proxy method if no polices are matched.

Note: Dedicated egress IPs are required to enable traffic egress policies.
empty_state_more_info: For more about Gateway Policies, see the full Gateway <0>documentation</0>.
ip_card_description: Your secondary IPs will only be used if your primary IP is rerouted.
no_egress_policy_description: Use the egress policy builder to define your preferred egress methods.
title: Egress Policies
